700543f-a.text:
Boston Road (trolley tracks thereon), north from Pelham Parkway South to White Plains Road. Also shown is the Pelham Parkway station and part of the elevated trestle of the I.R.T. White Plains Road subway line on the latter thoroughfare. The station straddles the entire breadth of the Bronx and Pelham Parkway. White Plains Road runs directly north, whereas Boston Road proceeds in a northeasterly direction.
1917.
James Suydam.
